Gladys Cherono Kiprono (amụrụ na 12 onwa Mee, na afo 1983) bụ onye Kenya ọkachamara na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-asọ mpi na track na road running events
Ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ meriri ma mita 5000 na mita 10,000 na African Championships na afọ 2012
Ọ bụ onye mmeri ugboro atọ nke Berlin Marathon na nke asatọ kachasị ọsọ nke ụmụ nwanyị na-agba ọsọ n'oge niile (dị ka nke 2020).
Ọ malitere ịgba ọsọ na asọmpi okporo ụzọ Spanish n'afọ 2004
O setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma nke 71:19 nkeji iji merie na afọ 2005 Media Maratón Santa Pola ma merie na Granollers Half Marathon
Ọ gara n'ihu na-asọmpi na agbụrụ dị ala ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ na 2007 Reims Half Marathon
Ọ meriri n'ọsọ ahụ n'afọ sochirinụ wee melite ihe kachasị mma ya na Porto Half Marathon, na-agba ọsọ 70:43 nkeji maka nke atọ

Ọ ka mma n'oge ahụ na 2009 Valladolid Half Marathon, na-ewere aha ahụ na ọsọ nke 69:26 nkeji, ma bụrụ onye nke abụọ na ọsọ Porto. O mere asọmpi ole na ole n'ime ọnwa 18 sochirinụ, mana ọ meriri Zhuhai Half Marathon na mbido mbụ ya n'Eshia na ọnwa Disemba na afọ 2011.
Cherono banyere n'ọkwa ndị a ma ama n'afọ 2012

Ọ bụ onye nke atọ na RAK Half Marathon na Prague Half Marathon, na-edekọ nkeji 68:18 kacha mma na asọmpi ikpeazụ. Ọ gakwara n'ihu n'okporo ụzọ ahụ, na-ewere 5000 mita na 10,000 mita utu aha na Kenya Defence Forces Championships. A họpụtara ya ka ọ gbaa ọsọ ihe omume ndị a na afọ 2012 African Championships in Athletics na, na enweghị ndị na-eme egwuregwu dị elu, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ meriri agbụrụ abụọ dị anya na asọmpi ahụ
Ọ gbara nkeji 15:40.04 maka nrite ọla edo nke 5000m bụ ihe ndekọ mmeri. A họrọghị ya ka ọ sọọ mpi na afọ 2012 Summer Olympics kama ọ gara n'ihu merie na Bogotá Half Marathon na Tilburg 10K.

O meriri Kenya Defence Forces Cross Country title na mbido afọ 2013, wee gbaa ọsọ kachasị mma nke 1:06:48 iji merie Prague Half Marathon oge nke mere ka ọ banye n'ime ụmụ nwanyị 10 kachasị ọsọ na-agba ọsọ n'oge niile. O meriri ihe omume ikpe nke mba maka 10,000 m wee gaa n'ihu were ọlaọcha n'azụ Tirunesh Dibaba. Ọ mechiri afọ ahụ site na onye nke abụọ na BOclassic na Delhi Half Marathon.

Na ọnwa Septemba, na afọ 2015, n'oge nke abụọ ya na-asọmpi na marathon distance, ọ meriri Berlin Marathon na 2:19:25 (nke kacha mma site na sekọnd 38), nke n'oge ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị nke asaa kachasị ọsọ n'oge niile.
Ka e mesịrị na Febụwarị 2016, Cherono mechara RAK Half Marathon na 1:06:07 (nke kachasị mma site na sekọnd 31), nke n'oge ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ nwanyị nke anọ kachasị ọsọ na ọkara marathon n'oge niile.
N'afọ 2017, Cherono meriri Berlin Marathon nke abụọ ya na oge nke 2:20:23. N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ meriri Berlin Marathon nke ugboro atọ na oge nke 2:18:11 ma setịpụ ihe ndekọ.
As of 2020[ref] Gladys Cherono gbara onye asatọ  na na abalị iri abụo na anọ bu onye gbakachara na ọsọ na igba ọsọ dị anya.
